review: amazing movie.. top notch performance by all the actors.. at start the story line sounds like loose. but starts gripping over to its best slowly. a perfect blend of action, thrill, and political drama.. 5star to kalki, emraan and abhay.
brilliant acting by all the actors and actresses. the story is gripping and most of all it explores the dark side of indian politics to which most of us turn a blind eye.
one of the best movie i have ever watched. one can easily guess why this type of movie isn't produced much by seeing its gross profit.
